rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}

description: This unit focuses on the law, regulation and governance of the Internet. It includes analysis of the technical nature of the Internet and contemporary theories of Internet law. The legal issues covered include jurisdiction, copyright, censorship, defamation, privacy and Internet domain names. The content of the unit changes to reflect current developments in Internet law, regulation and governance.
